long_desc.thetext:
Build of qemu-2.6.0-0.1.rc2.fc24 fails because it can't find a needed file.
from build.log (http://s390.koji.fedoraproject.org/koji/taskinfo?taskID=2187849) ... Executing(%install): /bin/sh -e /var/tmp/rpm-tmp.pCmq7M + umask 022 + cd /builddir/build/BUILD + '[' /builddir/build/BUILDROOT/qemu-2.6.0-0.1.rc2.fc24.s390x '!=' / ']' + rm -rf /builddir/build/BUILDROOT/qemu-2.6.0-0.1.rc2.fc24.s390x ++ dirname /builddir/build/BUILDROOT/qemu-2.6.0-0.1.rc2.fc24.s390x + mkdir -p /builddir/build/BUILDROOT + mkdir /builddir/build/BUILDROOT/qemu-2.6.0-0.1.rc2.fc24.s390x + cd qemu-2.6.0-rc2 + mkdir -p /builddir/build/BUILDROOT/qemu-2.6.0-0.1.rc2.fc24.s390x/lib/udev/rules.d + mkdir -p /builddir/build/BUILDROOT/qemu-2.6.0-0.1.rc2.fc24.s390x/usr/lib/systemd/system + mkdir -p /builddir/build/BUILDROOT/qemu-2.6.0-0.1.rc2.fc24.s390x/etc/qemu + install -D -p -m 0644 /builddir/build/SOURCES/ksm.service /builddir/build/BUILDROOT/qemu-2.6.0-0.1.rc2.fc24.s390x/usr/lib/systemd/system + install -D -p -m 0644 /builddir/build/SOURCES/ksm.sysconfig /builddir/build/BUILDROOT/qemu-2.6.0-0.1.rc2.fc24.s390x/etc/sysconfig/ksm + install -D -p -m 0755 ksmctl /builddir/build/BUILDROOT/qemu-2.6.0-0.1.rc2.fc24.s390x/usr/libexec/ksmctl + install -D -p -m 0644 /builddir/build/SOURCES/ksmtuned.service /builddir/build/BUILDROOT/qemu-2.6.0-0.1.rc2.fc24.s390x/usr/lib/systemd/system + install -D -p -m 0755 /builddir/build/SOURCES/ksmtuned /builddir/build/BUILDROOT/qemu-2.6.0-0.1.rc2.fc24.s390x/usr/sbin/ksmtuned + install -D -p -m 0644 /builddir/build/SOURCES/ksmtuned.conf /builddir/build/BUILDROOT/qemu-2.6.0-0.1.rc2.fc24.s390x/etc/ksmtuned.conf + install -D -p -m 0644 /builddir/build/SOURCES/kvm.conf /builddir/build/BUILDROOT/qemu-2.6.0-0.1.rc2.fc24.s390x/etc/modprobe.d/kvm.conf + install -m 0644 /builddir/build/SOURCES/qemu-guest-agent.service /builddir/build/BUILDROOT/qemu-2.6.0-0.1.rc2.fc24.s390x/usr/lib/systemd/system + install -m 0644 /builddir/build/SOURCES/99-qemu-guest-agent.rules /builddir/build/BUILDROOT/qemu-2.6.0-0.1.rc2.fc24.s390x/lib/udev/rules.d + install -d /builddir/build/BUILDROOT/qemu-2.6.0-0.1.rc2.fc24.s390x/etc/sysctl.d + install -m 0644 /builddir/build/SOURCES/50-kvm-s390.conf /builddir/build/BUILDROOT/qemu-2.6.0-0.1.rc2.fc24.s390x/etc/sysctl.d install: cannot stat '/builddir/build/SOURCES/50-kvm-s390.conf': No such file or directory RPM build errors: error: Bad exit status from /var/tmp/rpm-tmp.pCmq7M (%install) Bad exit status from /var/tmp/rpm-tmp.pCmq7M (%install ...
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): qemu-2.6.0-0.1.rc2.fc24
Oops, thanks for the report. Will be fixed in the next build
